document.discussion_title: Dog Agility Rally and Trials | WWLP.com
document.topic_text: Click to share on Pinterest (Opens in new window) CHICOPEE, Mass. (Mass Appeal) – We’re going to help you and your dog get in shape and have a backyard blast! The Pioneer Valley Kennel Club is hosting the Agility and Rally Trials at the Westfield Fairground, September 17th & 18th. Kim Reardon, Trish Libby and their dogs Frankie and Haagendaas visited the show with an agility demonstration! Share this:
